roles.name: Super User
roles.description: System Administrator. Can change all master data and has access to all the system screens.

roles.name: Grievance Officer
roles.description: Heads the grivance cell. Also all complaints that cannot be routed based on the rules are routed to Grievance Officer.

roles.name: Grivance Administrator
roles.description: System Administator for PGR. Can change PGR Master data only.

roles.name: Collection Operator
roles.description: Can Create, Search and Update Receipt

roles.name: Department Grievance Routing Officer
roles.description: GRO for a sepcific dept who assings the grievances to last mile employees

roles.name: PGR Administrator
roles.description: Admin role that has super access over the system

roles.name: Counter Employee
roles.description: Employee at the counter who performs assessment on behalf of citizen

roles.name: ULB Administrator
roles.description: Admin role that as access over an ulb

roles.name: State Administrator
roles.description: Admin role that as access over a state

roles.name: EGF Bill Creator
roles.description: Employee who creates Bills in finance

roles.name: EGF Bill Approver
roles.description: Employee who takes part in  Bills  approval in finance

roles.name: Finance Voucher Creator
roles.description: One who can create a voucher

roles.name: Finance Voucher Approver
roles.description: One who can approve a voucher

roles.name: Finance Payment Creator
roles.description: One who can create a payment

roles.name: Finance Payment Approver
roles.description: One who can approve a payment

roles.name: Finance Master Admin
roles.description: One who is the administrator for all master data in Finance

roles.name: Finance Report View
roles.description: One who has acess to all financial reports

roles.name: Collections Receipt Creator
roles.description: One who can create and approve a receipt and receipt voucher

roles.name: Collections Remitter
roles.description: One who can remit the instruments to bank

roles.name: System Integrator Finance
roles.description: Role for allowing system integration of Finance app with rainmaker

roles.name: System Integrator W&S
roles.description: Role for allowing system integration of Water and Sewerage app with rainmaker

roles.name: Employee Finance
roles.description: All Employees who use Finance application

roles.name: PGR Last Mile Employee
roles.description: PGR Last mile employee to whom the request can be assigned

roles.name: HRMS ADMIN
roles.description: HRMS Administrator which can create new employees

roles.name: PT Report Viewer
roles.description: PT User that can view tabular reports

roles.name: PGR Report Viewer
roles.description: PGR User that can view tabular reports

roles.name: MCollect Report Viewer
roles.description: MCollect User that can view tabular reports

roles.name: Pet Counter Employee
roles.description: Counter Employee in Pet Application who files application on behalf of the citizen

roles.name: MDMS ADMIN
roles.description: MDMS User that can create and search schema

roles.name: Dashboard Employee
roles.description: Dashboard Employee which can view vity specific dashboard
